about.label: ABOUT DANIEL
about.headline: CRAFTING DIGITAL MOVEMENT
about.body: I transform static ideas into dynamic visual narratives. Specializing in high-end motion graphics and immersive 3D experiences that bridge the gap between imagination and reality.

projects.name: CHROME FLOW
projects.description: Experimental fluid simulation using high-viscosity liquid metal. Exploring the interplay between light and motion through procedural generation techniques.

projects.name: SILVER SHIFT
projects.description: A study on light dispersion and brushed aluminum reflections. Combining real-time rendering with post-production grading.

projects.name: DARK MERCURY
projects.description: Minimalist motion study in a low-gravity vacuum environment. Abstract forms that challenge perception of space and time.

projects.name: VOID GEOMETRY
projects.description: Procedural generation of monolithic architectural structures. Where mathematics meets cinematic visual storytelling.
